div.p: This is an example set of Content Derivative type codes, which represent the minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle, which is sufficient to manage that source information, for example, in a repository, registry, processes and workflows, for making access control decisions, and providing query responses.
Copyright Statement: This is an example set.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: This is an example set of Content Derivative type codes, which represent the minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle, which is sufficient to manage that source information, for example, in a repository, registry, processes and workflows, for making access control decisions, and providing query responses.
